data.prayer: Father, we pray that the county of Ratlam be filled with simple churches in every neighborhood.
data.verse: For the earth will be full of the knowledge of the Lord, as the waters cover the sea.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Ratlam, Madhya Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Ratlam, Madhya Pradesh, India. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.section_summary: On average, 118 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Ratlam, Madhya Pradesh, India.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Lord, use Google search to lead people in Ratlam, Madhya Pradesh, India to the gospel today.
Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Ratlam, Madhya Pradesh, India.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Lodha (Muslim traditions) people.
Spirit, encourage the church in Ratlam, Madhya Pradesh, India to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the county of Ratlam access to a Bible in their own language.

data.section_summary:
the county of Ratlam, Madhya Pradesh, India has a population of 1,455,100.

We estimate Ratlam has 16,006 people who might know Jesus, 17,655 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,421,439 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 16,006 believers in the county of Ratlam.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.
